Headline: #49 Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Western/29th
ShortDescription: Southbound 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 31st, California, 35th & Western: due to, street blockage near Western/29th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 31st, California, 35th and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/29th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
